title: More challenging champions please (for those who like to challenge their skills)
body: I think riot should make a champ that has a mini quick time event and the better the accuracy of this event, the more damage. This event can be done on stack 3 or 4 times so this doesnt need to be done in team fights or 1v1s

replies.body: I failed to see the "challenge their skills" in your idea. Just some mandatory pre-fight actions, like old Rengar stacking passive before the gank or old Vlad stacking his E on minions.
Looking at his match history he hasn't played a mechanic intensive champion in forever (if ever). I don't think he knows what he's talking about.
